Title: Relates to labeling requirements for native plant seeds
Summary: Requires certain information to be included on labeling of native plant seeds for sale or distribution in New York state; requires the commissioner of agriculture and markets to promulgate certain requirements for labeling of native plant seeds; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง142-c, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to labeling requirements for native plant seeds
